LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="2c695bba114b4d509be90dad8c2fc137" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Hey,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you're that rookie I've been hearing
aaall about,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Hoo, am I thankful
for YOU![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2c695bba114b4d509be90dad8c2fc137" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I'm [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] pilot of the one and the only
S.S. Shepherd. [etc:Wait frame="8"/]And I am deeply PLEASED
to meet you![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2c695bba114b4d509be90dad8c2fc137" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I'm also relieved to see that you are just
as BRIGHT as the cap said!
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Intro_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][UE:Meta key="c425e991c04141e8a17fd9e444e978ad" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="Think"/]While I had leaves on the brain,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my head
couldn't STOP thinking about Dandori...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c425e991c04141e8a17fd9e444e978ad" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]So listen,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I need your help.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I need you
to save [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]EVERYONE who got leafified
like me[System:Color name="Default"]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Seriously.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Every last one![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c425e991c04141e8a17fd9e444e978ad" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="Talk"/]Hoo,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's no small thing,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I know.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But there
are rewards in it for you.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Believe me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've
picked up a WHOLE lot of raw materials.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c425e991c04141e8a17fd9e444e978ad" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="GoodJobFaceOnly"/]I mean it.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm counting on you,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] OK?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Good LUCK, rookie!
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_01_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="0ef1992de0c042739e829aa54937b105" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You should talk to the doc if you're
interested in night expeditions.
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="acaca18eeca0479db4d874767d38495d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Heya, ROOKIE![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Don't forget to do some
night expeditions,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] OK?
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_02_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="73fdebad8a6f43e58863ce73eda2e866" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Heading out on night expeditions is a good
way to get the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]glow sap [System:Color name="Default"]you NEED for
the cure.
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="b8d7e5951bbc4ccbbd1756c6d83b64f2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]NICE work, rookie![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Let's see if you can
keep it up!
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_03_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="f15308af0d204f948b3a3914fcfc5956" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="Talk"/]Your work ethic is out of this WORLD![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
You're no "rookie,"[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that's for sure.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I think I'm gonna have to promote you.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f15308af0d204f948b3a3914fcfc5956" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="ClapHandsFaceOnly"/]From NOW on,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I think I'll call you
[Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]!
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_03_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="c2659315b2c94765884e18e5978af8a6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]HEYA, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]![etc:Wait frame="8"/] How are you doing?
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_04_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="5b37104bbdbb4643ad05764e26d5659a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hey, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]how're the night expeditions going?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It's OK to take your time. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]All that matters
is that you DO IT,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] alright?
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_04_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="3b50372615f44c7bb6a930bf3d0ebb12" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Stay focused on collecting glow sap,
[Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's REAL important.
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_05_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="d07acbb530394049b91103b6ae77b48b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]You're in the final stretch![etc:Wait frame="15"/] If anyone can
get this done,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's YOU!
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_05_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="427df46d04d543e49199943c9ada81e0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You can do this![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Just a few more to go.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Get out there and CURE the rest!
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear01: [Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="3b02c8739c1b4077807c8ff290af3921" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]They're all cured![etc:Wait frame="15"/] WELL DONE!
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="75decb4b5a834e56abecf76df0ceff50" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]It's official! [etc:Wait frame="15"/]You are a FULL-FLEDGED
member of the crew![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Hooo,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I am SO
glad I asked for your help!
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Quest_ChildClear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="a3830cde57fd4dcd815278534e7d941a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ClapHands"/]You're making some real good progress
curing folks.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You know what that means...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
REWARD time!
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Quest_ChildClear02: [Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="2"/][UE:Meta key="16f0c2330198401b96973c9118bce33f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I like your pace.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Keep it UP!
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearA0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="f63c9dbe8d364e7d9d0cec1f03fc4054" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]WHAT?![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You've already rescued everyone?
[etc:Wait frame="15"/]You work FAST![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f63c9dbe8d364e7d9d0cec1f03fc4054" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ClapHandsFaceOnly"/]You sure don't act like you're new to this,
rookie.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Color me SURPRISED!

[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="2"/][UE:Meta key="3b08ebcbce5246b6b7e0362365257f1f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]You definitely earned that reward.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Way to GO, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]!
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearB0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="d9f732bb56644f50a355a0b050aafa7e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Hahaha![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You've rescued that many?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Already?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] NICELY DONE, rookie!

[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="2"/][UE:Meta key="02674ab2fcba4029b4efdd1b0dc8daa7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ClapHands"/]You certainly deserve that reward and
more.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Keep up the AMAZING work!
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Intro_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="a45892264709428a948c0bb97f408044" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Listenâ€”I want you to be careful when
you're out there exploring, you HEAR?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
You gotta take care of yourself.
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Intro_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="4ab4276e639e4005af60ae33be7b97bb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Goooood morning![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Hoo,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I am feeling
GREAT today!
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="b0db8ffcad0b4efa929db9d658ab5df9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]The doc gave me some good info,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so
BUCKLE UP while I share some of the
finer points about night expeditions.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b0db8ffcad0b4efa929db9d658ab5df9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]First, since you're still pretty GREEN,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he
recommends keeping a close EYE on that
map of yours.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b0db8ffcad0b4efa929db9d658ab5df9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]And make sure you pay attention to where
the creatures are.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and don't forget to
collect glow sap.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] That's IMPORTANT.
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="247658a0ea9d4a13b21998f4f0f8d283" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]When I was all leaf-eaten,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my brain was full
of NOTHIN' but Dandori, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]Dandori,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Dandori![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="247658a0ea9d4a13b21998f4f0f8d283" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Seriously,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I couldn't think about ANYTHING
else,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] not even a little bit![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Strangest thing.
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="2a45c6fd7b5f4287958a78755f94f5de" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I'm told that when you beat the BIG
creatures while on a night expedition,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
a bunch of glow pellets come out![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2a45c6fd7b5f4287958a78755f94f5de" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]So use a Glowmob on the big guys.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You've
got nothing to be afraid of when you
ATTACK with everyone. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]Safety in numbers![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2a45c6fd7b5f4287958a78755f94f5de" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]At least...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]that's what the DOC told me.
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="fc35272991f7435b9f0dc47aed623969" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="Talk02"/]Come to think of it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] before I got leafified,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I was pretty beat up.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fc35272991f7435b9f0dc47aed623969" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="Talk"/]And then,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] when I got all de-leafified...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I was in GOOD SHAPE again![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fc35272991f7435b9f0dc47aed623969" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="Think"/]I was so obsessed with Dandori then that
it's hard to keep it all straight.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] But maybe
being LEAFED out...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]fixes you up?
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="58da7680ce7c4f3a915fa323338f4d1e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Have you ever gotten so into looking
around during a night expedition that
your Lumiknoll gets ATTACKED?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="58da7680ce7c4f3a915fa323338f4d1e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's not a bad idea to stay closer to
home and be a bit more defensive when
engaging enemies.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="58da7680ce7c4f3a915fa323338f4d1e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]ANYHOO...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]that's what the doc told me.
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="ea1c736d7c1a4d01be203ee2f4f177c2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Before I joined the Rescue Corps,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I was a
PILOT for a space-flight company.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ea1c736d7c1a4d01be203ee2f4f177c2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Back then,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I was one half of a DYNAMIC
duo with my buddy [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf08"/]Santi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Hoo,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we had
a GOOD time!
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="09bec44b217041288274a5a5265976e4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]When things aren't going your way,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
stop for a bit and let things COOL
OFF.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It's important.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="09bec44b217041288274a5a5265976e4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]It's like I always say,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] "STELLAR things
come to those who wait."
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="587ec8f4225a46368d74ff85f5e89dc3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Even when [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] was leafed out,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
he was still trying to RESCUE folks![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="587ec8f4225a46368d74ff85f5e89dc3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]And there I was with my head focused
on nothing but Dandori stuff.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] HOO, he's
one tough cookie!
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_05_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="8c49ce2ad5d545b8ae520f7330ebdcf4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You know how sometimes right before you
wrap up something big,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you get a little TOO
relaxed?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] A little TOO sure of yourself?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8c49ce2ad5d545b8ae520f7330ebdcf4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]What I'm saying is...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]don't let your guard
down until it's all OVER,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] OK?
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_05_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="b6cc0c9bf372495b837585d72a57cc88" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You know, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]the cap is the reason I left
my old job and joined the Rescue Corps.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
She SCOUTED me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b6cc0c9bf372495b837585d72a57cc88" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]If she hadn't,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'd probably still be piloting
for the space-flight company.
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="1702f3198e374f8ea6eb7ad19ba05f1d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I sure hope you don't lose that NEVER-
GIVE-UP attitude of yours.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1702f3198e374f8ea6eb7ad19ba05f1d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]That right there is the single most
valuable TREASURE you have in your
possession, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/].
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="6c0050ec43b840008f0e6508e7305536" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]The work the Rescue Corps does is as
HARD as it gets.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But you know what?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It's also as rewarding as it gets![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6c0050ec43b840008f0e6508e7305536" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]My teammates are thoughtful, reliable,
and professional. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]Each and EVERY ONE
of 'em!
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="672806db38cb4b8299fc9dd97ea1f1f3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]When I was all leaf-eaten,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my brain was full
of NOTHIN' but Dandori, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]Dandori,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Dandori![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="672806db38cb4b8299fc9dd97ea1f1f3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Seriously,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I couldn't think about ANYTHING
else,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] not even a little bit![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Strangest thing.
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="0a9d08c979fe4ce1859a45397bec0992" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="Talk02"/]Come to think of it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] before I got leafified,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I was pretty beat up.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0a9d08c979fe4ce1859a45397bec0992" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="Talk"/]And then,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] when I got all de-leafified...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I was in GOOD SHAPE again![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0a9d08c979fe4ce1859a45397bec0992" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_03_Leaf" name="Think"/]I was so obsessed with Dandori then that
it's hard to keep it all straight.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] But maybe
being LEAFED out...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]fixes you up?
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="161349b6df84466cbcc4ff30e6738e44" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Before I joined the Rescue Corps,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I was a
PILOT for a space-flight company.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="161349b6df84466cbcc4ff30e6738e44" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Back then,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I was one half of a DYNAMIC
duo with my buddy Santi.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Hoo,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we had
a GOOD time!
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="550792c8f60742ea85993e863ecf65ea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]When things aren't going your way,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
stop for a bit and let things COOL
OFF.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It's important.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="550792c8f60742ea85993e863ecf65ea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]It's like I always say,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] "STELLAR things
come to those who wait."
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="3474077f31664e09902cebfea4b10e49" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Even when Olimar was leafed out,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
he was still trying to RESCUE folks![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3474077f31664e09902cebfea4b10e49" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]And there I was with my head focused
on nothing but Dandori stuff.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] HOO, he's
one tough cookie!
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="ed6c8d2a0e074536b787d582cee53a41" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You know, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]the cap is the reason I left
my old job and joined the Rescue Corps.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
She SCOUTED me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ed6c8d2a0e074536b787d582cee53a41" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]If she hadn't,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'd probably still be piloting
for the space-flight company.
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Continue_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="4558914a9a684effbf1f7c44a96513c4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You need anything else?
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="f8540d95eaf74b84a789d540dff800c8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Heya, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Keep on carrying the
team, OK?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I don't know where we'd
be without YOU!
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="ce56bc6af5ba4f85858e40ca8c049bac" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="8"/] HEY![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You getting along nice with
your buddy?
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Confirm_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="5070b5d015fa4edea7cd6f7e19094687" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You're ready to take off, like, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]LITERALLY?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
That means we'll be saying goodbye to this
planet...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]for good.
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_TakeOff_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="5a910239671941e5aaa09cf5fd8923ea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]OK, OK![etc:Wait frame="15"/] All aboard the S.S. Shepherd![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
We're TAKING OFF right away!
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Outro_A01: [Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="2"/][UE:Meta key="436189b48f2b4033835c4a2bfe9b18e3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]See YA!
